name: Livi Zheng
introduction: Livi Zheng（生于1989年4月3日），是一名来自印度尼西亚的制片人， 导演， 编剧，演员以及动作替身女演员。 她在15岁时开始担任替身演员，2014年完成电影《Brush with Danger》，目前她刚刚拍摄完成另一部动作惊悚片，由Tony Todd(托尼•托德), John Savage (约翰•沙维奇），Ken Zheng（肯•郑）, Keith David(凯斯•大卫），Madeline Zima(玛德琳•奇玛）以及Sean Patrick Flannery(肖恩•帕特里克•弗兰纳里)出演。Livi Zheng (born April 3, 1989) is an Indonesian producer, director, screenwriter, actress, and stuntwoman. She began her career as a stuntwoman at the age of fifteen and has since directed Brush with Danger (2014) and she just finished shooting another action thriller starring Tony Todd,[3] John Savage, Ken Zheng, Keith David, Madeline Zima and Sean Patrick Flannery.
